_tender announcement_
###  Department of National Defence
####  Solicitation SCC-24-00027620:T

 Gets Shared Services Canada (SSC) inviting responses for a solicitation marked as **expired**. The contract is related to **ADP Software (TAI)**.

Key Details:

* **Publication Date**: 17th September 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: 03-10-2024 14:00
* **Location**: Ontario, Canada (except for National Capital Region)
* **End User**: Shared Services Canada

Please note that due to the contract being marked as **expired**, it is not possible to submit new bids.

### Important Details:
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding
* **Selection Criteria**: None mentioned
* **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
* **Trade Regions**: Ontario (except for National Capital Region)
* **Language of Preference**: English

### Submission Instructions:

To be able to submit a bid, please register in the SSC P2P portal: https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login

To access the submission portal, please follow the secure link provided at the end of this document.

Bidders need to ensure they comply with the set bid requirements to ensure their bid is valid and can be evaluated as per the SSC rules and regulations.

Feel free to ask me any questions about this tender announcement in the comments below.

Also, you can download the tender document from the given attachment URL below.

*   **Attachment (English)**: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/5603A0B5-269B-4850-B94A-9CEE0A4C4B6A
*   **Attachment (French)**: https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/fr/fil/download_public/67B4FA05-FCD7-4400-BE19-2398CF559912
